quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Film and Afi
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, oz, people. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Besides Orson Welles with Citizen Kane, who is the only lead actor of a Top Ten American classic who also (co-)directed the film he starred in?

options.text: Gene Kelly  - Singin in the Rain

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gene Kelly  - Singin in the Rain

questions.question: In AFIs list of movies, the Top Ten were all made from the 1930s to the 1990s, however no film on the Top Ten list was made in the 1980s.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In what Disney film does the following exchange take place:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beauty and the Beast

questions.question: The majority of filming for the 1978 comedy Animal House was done at what major US university?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: University of Oregon

questions.question: How many of the AFI Top Ten American films are also listed among the top 100 titles rented by Netflix subscribers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 0

questions.question: What song from a Top Ten movie is rated Number 2 by the AFI, after the all-time favorite Over the Rainbow?

options.text: Its Hard Out Here for a Pimp ( Hustle and Flow 2005)

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: As Time Goes By (Casablanca 1942)

questions.question: In Animal House, before giving Larry and Kent their Delta names, Bluto gives names to two other pledges. What is the name of the guy just before Larry?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mothball

questions.question: On the hugely popular International Movie Data Base web site (imdb.com), members rated this Number 3 AFI Top Ten movie as Number 1 of the sites Top 250 Movies of All Time.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Godfather

questions.question: What Disney film is this dialogue from:

options.text: nt tell me. Were about to go over a huge waterfall.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Emperors New Groove

questions.question: How many of the AFI Top Ten American movies were created by foreign-born directors?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 4

questions.question: Apart from The Wizard of Oz, little people, or midgets, were used in what other Top Ten picture, to help achieve a visual effect?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Casablanca

questions.question: This 1967 comedy, which may be the Top Ten American movie with the lowest profile and one of the lowest budgets, starred a newcomer named Dustin Hoffman.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Graduate

questions.question: In a separate AFI poll that ranks 100 of  Americas Most Inspiring Movies, the 1946 movie Its a Wonderful Life leads the pack.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What Disney film are these lines from: Oh, that clock! Old killjoy. I hear you. Come on, get up, you say, Time to start another day. Even he orders me around. Well, theres one thing. They cant order me to stop dreaming.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cinderella

questions.question: What is the full Greek name of the Delta house in the comedy Animal House?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Delta Tau Chi

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Animal House
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, couch. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the 1978 film Animal House, the guys from Delta stole the questions to what subject exam out of the trash dumpster?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Psychology

questions.question: In the 1978 movie Animal House, when the Delta boys scam Fawn Lebowitzs friends into going out with them to the Dexter Lake Club, Boon goes to the bar and orders drinks for himself and the other 7. What kind of drink did he order for the other 7 people in the group?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Seven Carlings

questions.question: In the movie The Perfect Storm, the crew has no idea they were heading into the storm, because their equipment fails, and the weather report never gets to them.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which of the following characters was not seated on the couch or chairs in the reject section at the Omega House rush party in the movie Animal House?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Franklin

questions.question: What Animal House actor went on to co-star in numerous movies, including “Wildcats,” The Insider,” and My Cousin Vinny?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bruce McGill

questions.question: In the 2000 movie The Perfect Storm, what is the name of the bar where the crew hangs out when not at sea?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Crows Nest

questions.question: How many children are left fatherless when The Andrea Gail sinks, and all crew members are lost at sea at the end of The Perfect Storm?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 3

questions.question: The 1978 comedy Animal House was written by Chris Miller, Harold Ramis and Douglas Kenney. Ramis became a well known director. Miller appeared in the movie with a bit part credited as Hardbar.” Kenney; however, had a more prominent role. What character did Kenney portray in the movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stork

questions.question: What is Boons first name in the movie Animal House?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Donald

questions.question: Although you never see him, there is a fisherman who dies on a The Andrea Gails sister boat at the beginning of the movie The Perfect Storm. What was his name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ben

questions.question: In The Perfect Storm, what is the name of The Andrea Gails sister boat, captained by Linda Greenlaw, played by actress Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Hannah Boden

questions.question: In The Perfect Storm, who are the two crew members who jump in the water to save Murphs life when he is pulled overboard by a line that gets hooked through his hand?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sully and Bobby

questions.question: How many days are the crew members home from their latest trip, before they set out on their ill fated trip in The Perfect Storm?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2

questions.question: According to the ending credits of the movie Animal House, Boon and Katy got married in 1964 and divorced in what year?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1969

questions.question: Who informs Hoover that the guys from Delta missed all the questions on their exam in the movie Animal House?

options.text: The boys from the Omega House
The boys from the Jewish House

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The boys from the Jewish House

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alcoholic

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Missionary

questions.question: Even decades after its summer debut, this Steven Spielberg movie makes some people afraid to go into the water. In what movie does Martin Brody advise, Youre gonna need a bigger boat.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jaws

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scarface

questions.question: What character did Humphrey Bogart portray in the 1951 movie, The African Queen?

questions.question: In Back to the Future, November 5, 1955 is referred to as a red letter date in history because that is the day Doc hit his head and created time travel.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: The first rule of the fictional Fight Club is you do not talk about Fight Club. What is the second rule of Fight Club?

options.text: Only two guys to a fight
If its your first night at Fight Club, you have to fight.
You DO NOT talk about Fight Club

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: You DO NOT talk about Fight Club

questions.question: What speed must the time machine in Back to the Future achieve in order to travel through time?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 88mph

questions.question: What makes time travel possible according to fictional character Doc Brown?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Flux Capacitor

questions.question: Although this film was still in the theaters when Empires movie poll was conducted, it still won 15th
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Dark Knight

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Charlie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, martins, ship. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: According to her autobiography, who did John Huston tell Hepburn to model her portrayal of Rose after, in the movie, The African Queen?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eleanor Roosevelt

questions.question: Who is the oldest of Benjamin Martins children from the movie The Patriot?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gabriel

questions.question: In the scene in The African Queen where Charlie was pulling The Queen through the overgrowth, Huston used real leeches in the water without telling Bogart, so his revulsion would be real.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the movie by the same name, what part of the African Queen gets severely damaged in the trip down the rapids?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The propeller and shaft

questions.question: In the movie, The African Queen, how did Charlie and Rose plan to destroy the German war boat on the lake?

options.text: Make firebombs and torch the boat.
Build homemade torpedoes and ram the war boat.
Ram the boat and puncture the hull.
Sneak aboard and set off an explosive charge.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Build homemade torpedoes and ram the war boat.

questions.question: What was the name of the German ship that patrolled the lake in the 1951 movie, The African Queen?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Louisa

questions.question: Who directed the 1951 classic, The African Queen?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Huston

questions.question: In the movie classic, The African Queen, what was Charlies drink of choice, until Rose forced him into sobriety?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gin and river water

questions.question: What one favor did Charlie ask the captain of the war boat, in the 1951 movie, The African Queen?

options.text: He asked if he could have one last drink, since Rose had dumped all his liquor overboard.
He asked for a decent cigar, seeing as how all of his had been drenched down the rapids.
He asked if the captain could marry them before they were executed.
He asked if they could execute him first, so he would not have to witness Roses hanging.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He asked if the captain could marry them before they were executed.

questions.question: Who played Roses brother, the minister, in the movie, The African Queen?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robert Morley

questions.question: In the 2000 movie The Patriot, who was the first of Benjamin Martins kids to die?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thomas

questions.question: In the movie, The African Queen, Charlie is American by birth.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which Clint Eastwood movie is a fictionalized account of the making of the movie, The African Queen?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: White Hunter, Black Heart

questions.question: In the movie, The African Queen, the safety valve on the Queens boiler was malfunctioning because there was a screwdriver stuck in it.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the movie, The African Queen, Charlie and Rose saw what animals, causing Charlie to warn Rose that they are more dangerous than they look?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A group of hippos

questions.question: In the 2000 movie The Patriot, who was Occam?

options.text: Occam was commander of the British army.
Occam was a slave who fought for the Americans to get out of slavery.
Occam was a French man who helped the Americans improve their skills.
